response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we propose to sell the product to you at a price of $950,000. We are confident this offer strikes a balance between reflecting the true worth of the product and providing you with a competitive advantage. We look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
